comment: He's a great professor, explains every concept in depth, helps students if they have any questions. He keeps the class involved, and makes jokes to make the lectures more enjoyable. His tests are challenging, and include free answers at the end of them but he gives a lot of partial credit if you can show you know what to do but get the answer wrong

Don't know why he doesn't have a higher rating. Actually understandable unlike the rest of the thickly-accented staff of Chemistry professors kennesaw employs. Engaging lectures, funny in a goofy way, and his tests he lets you leave 2 questions blank and doesnt grade those two, so you basically get 2 freebies. Overall, best chem professor.

His tests have short answer questions at the end. Those got me every time. I don't feel as if his lectures or powerpoints reflected the test. He uses Aleks for homework. I didn't like it. Take at your own risk. Work hard.

Rushton was a great chemistry teacher to me. I learned alot whenever he taught. The tests were difficult, but if you studied enough you could do well. He likes to make the students talk in the class and can be a bit condescending if you don't know what to say. Regardless, he really helped chemistry to make sense to me. I recommend him.
His style of teaching was confusing, tests were pretty hard. Not an easy professor to have if you want to get an A or B
Uses slides for a different book than the one he requires we get; the online homework he assigns also uses a different book.

Dr. Rushton is nice but for me at least his teaching style was terrible. His tests are incredibly difficult and you dont ever know whats going to be on there. He doesnt do any practice calculations in class so you have to teach yourself. I Recommend someone else

Would not recommend. I received an A in Chemistry one, and on the first test from Gregory I received a 45. The quizzes are hard and random, no practice problems are given, and he has not been in our class since the first test was given- instead, we have 3 TA's that do their best to teach us. If you are looking to learn Chemistry- wrong teacher!
I thought he was a good guy. He is pretty funny but his tests are pretty hard. It's really time consuming and I would not recommend him for the course if you cannot dedicate a lot of time.

Dr. Rushton is hard, and this class is time consuming, but you learn so much from it! For an upper level class it is supposed to be interesting and he made it awesome. Not a day in class went by that I wasn't interested and taught to think in a new way. Take this class!

*Upper level chem course review* Dr. Rushton is an amazing professor! I loved his format of teaching and loved how he incorporated the class into discussions and conceptual thinking rather than just straight lecture. Although there is a good bit of work to do for the class, I loved it and was really happy to be a part of this class.

Think twice! He uses ALEKS, which is a software that makes u want to kill yourself, or someone's pet. . . Seriously, except you are fine with utterly stressing yourself out over General Chemistry II, think twice. Othe plus side, his lectures are never boring, but I'll take Stephen Hawkings if it gets me an A.

It is hard to get a B in this class. In the middle of this semester, half of the class withdrew. His lectures are fun but his tests are extremely hard. Homework n quizzes are overwhelming. He doesn't care about your grades and your success, and has an unbelievably high expectation for all his students.

Good guy overall, pretty funny, made the class interesting, but also made the class harder than it should've been. Very unclear on what he wants from you on tests, doesn't prepare you for tests, practise test is completely different than what you see on the test. Being an A student, i had to struggle to make a B in this class.

Funny guy, did lots of experiments in class, however his lectures were unclear. He never prepared us for his tests which were difficult. Study the book, it'll be your friend. Catalyst quizzes were pointless. No dropped tests and no curves whatsoever. What you see is what you get.

He is very willing to help students and encourages class and office hour attendence. His lectures are creative and relaxed, but his tests were hard in comparison. If you aren't taking any other classes or working this class should be easy. But most ppl have lives. NO EXTRA CREDIT. NO DROPPED EXAMS. Prepare to dedicate yourself to Chemistry if you w

He is a great teacher. If you think he is bad, grades weird, or isn't clear on test material, it's because you never came to class. He is always willing to help, but only if you want to help yourself. Show up at his office hours, he has them every day.

Tests were awful. Lecture was always fun, but when it came down to tests or quizzes, he was never clear on the material you should know or the types of questions you'd see on the exams. He also liked talking down to students as if they were completely unintelligent.
Great class, great professor. Take this class if you can.
Great class and an awesome teacher! Take this course!

Dr Rushton was hard! He didn't really lecture in a way that taught the material. He asked students questions and never clarified the answers. He wouldn't guarentee extra credit, hw, or test grades. I felt it was hard to track my progress and thought I went into the final with a high B but barely passed. He writes his own final and it is HARD. STUDY
Dr. Rushton was able to keep the class interesting, but he was unreliable and wishy-washy when it came to homework, tests, and grading, which made it difficult to track your progress.

had him for chem teaching methods. a lot of work in the class itself, but easy easy work. just do the hw's and yu'll get an A. easy to talk with, easy to negotiate with. understands student's points of views and is caring for student's knowledge. very generous teacher and was always there for help. thanks rushdog!
He has such a cool personality-very easy to talk to.

Dr. Rushton is a great teacher. He will help you out as much as possible. He uses his office hours as study sessions and if you go it is very benefical. I recommend him as a teacher espeically now that that the class will have a text book instead of book on cd.

i had dr. rushton for lab.  he loves his students and gets to know them and their names!  he is full of energy, but is sometimes confusing.  and make sure you do your assignments for lab, otherwise you'll be out in the hall doing them while he teaches!  but overall, a good teacher!
Dr. Rushton is a very good teacher.  He loves his students and is ALWAYS willing to help.  However, he is very often confused about the assignments he has given to students.:-)

Dr. Rushton is such a great teacher. He is one of the teachers that help students out a great deal! We had office hours right after class, when you can ask questions and do homework.
